name: Swedish Bioenergy Association
membership:
AEBIOM - European Biomass Association
WBA - World Bioenergy Association
goal:
Svebio's goal is to promote the use of bioenergy in an economically and environmentally optimal way, in Sweden and in other countries. It is equally important to develop an environmentally sound energy system based on renewable energy sources, as to do this in a way that is profitable to all businesses involved in this work, to guarantee stable jobs and income. We favour a 100 percent renewable energy system where bioenergy plays an important role. Today, bioenergy accounts for 37 percent of final energy use in Sweden.
Svebio has about 300 businesses and institutions as members, as well as a few private members. See https://www.svebio.se/om-oss/vara-medlemmar.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Transport
euInitiatives:
All energy policies with relevance to the bioenergy business sector.
Energy Union, Consultations on all the new directives concerning energy and climate policies 2020 - 2030, Sustainability criteria for biomass and biogas for heat and electricity. LULUCF issues.
Carbon pricing and carbon taxation; ETS.
